name: UiWindow

arguments.name: clip
arguments.desc: Clip content outside window. Default is false.

arguments.name: inherit
arguments.desc: Inherit current clip region (for nested clip regions)

description: Set up new bounds. Calls to UiWidth, UiHeight, UiCenter and UiMiddle
will operate in the context of the window size.
If clip is set to true, contents of window will be clipped to
bounds (only works properly for non-rotated windows).
